text: Aleix Suñé (born May 21, 1986 in Girona) is a skier from Spain. Aleix SUNE SEGALA - Player Profile - Alpine Skiing - Eurosport Asia He helps skiers who cannot see by telling them where to go on a mountain. He skiied at the 2009 IPC Alpine Skiing World Championships with Gabriel Gorce Yepes. He skied at the 2010 Winter Paralympics with Andrés Boira. == References == Category:Spanish skiers Category:Living people Category:1986 births Category:2010 Winter Paralympics Category:Sighted guides Category:People from Catalonia
title: Aleix Suñé
